price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߕߏߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߘߊߎ߫، ߤߊ߲߫߸ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ߓߏ߲߬ߓߊ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߕߍ߰ߟߊ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
